summary: Encapsulates a wav2vec‑2.0 Conformer acoustic model fine‑tuned for Connectionist Temporal Classification, providing initialization and inference capabilities for converting raw audio waveforms into token logits suitable for speech‑to‑text transcription.
business_intent: Provide an out‑of‑the‑box, high‑accuracy speech recognition component that developers can integrate to automatically transcribe spoken audio into text.
